name: Bullet Hero (OST Jam)
description:
Bullet Hero is still under heavy development, a list of updates I want to add can be found below.

This game is my submission to the OST Jam.

Inspired by a hybrid of Rhythm and Bullet Hell games. Dodge shots and collect points!

Contributing artists:
  • Keynan - Secrets
  • GARDNSOUND - Best-Laid Plans - Website
  • Inkedsplat - to Hell and Back
  • MelonadeM - genDeR dysPHoRia - Website
  • amphobius - Dataland - Website
  • Atmospherium - How Can I Be Of Service - Website
  • Track - Moments Before the End
  • lunarya - hypnosis to love bitcrush (REAL) (NOT CLICKBAIT) - Website
Planned updates:
  • Better display of score and multiplier
  • A logo and some kind of graphic design
  • Intensity slider to make the game more chill
  • More interesting visual effects with walls and background
  • Better song selection interface
  • More music
  • GAME JUICE 🧃
  • Stats stream when song is complete
  • Tracking high score and score progress while playing
  • Sound effects and stuff
  • More dynamic levels
  • Lots more!
